pageContext.title: THE RUDY SCHWARTZ PROJECT â€“ Remembering A Summertime Rash
pageContext.content: The long feared “best-of” release from the formative years of the Rudy Schwartz Project! Includes “Kill for God”, “An Orange is Nothing But a Juicy Pumpkin”, and many more equally offensive anthems of the home cassette recording era. CDs are now sold out, but downloads are available from the usual corporate parasites.
